NatureFriendlyData.desc: Generate almost all our energy off grid from Renewable sources (Solar and Wind)
Use only LEDs and CFLs for all our lighting needs and a soon moving towards 100% LEDs only
Cook 50% of meals and 20% of our guest meals on parabolic solar cookers
Recycle 80% of all grey water & use this to water plants on the property
Provide pure mountain water for consumption, from our 300 feet deep bore well
Organically grow all the flowers that we use daily, on our own property
Have 4 km of private paths, on which guided trails are conducted to expose our guests to the beautiful flora and fauna of the region
Limit our accommodation so that each guest can have around 1 acre of green space, thus reducing the stress on the forest while providing a private and serene experience

ExperienceExploreData.header: BOARD GAMES AND TABLE TOP GAMES

body.title: JUNE - SEPTEMBER
body.desc: The locality experiences heavy rainfall and is known as Cherapunjee aka Sohra of the south. An exemplary weather to catch up on the missing books and novels, with our in-house game-room you can enjoy an extended stay at our resort.

body.title: OCTOBER - FEBRUARY
body.desc: It is the best weather to plan a holiday with us. The weather is cool and refreshing throughout the day. One can enjoy the afternoon sun beside the pool or hike into the forest to admire the beauty of the waterfall.

body.title: MARCH - MAY
body.desc: Perfect place to enjoy the summer vibes. The place offers an excellent combination of the mild summer sun and cool mountain breeze. Also have a chance to experience the “Dandeli Mist”, it is the phenomena where during daylight one can encounter a wild patch of fog, moving through the forest. The visibility as low as 20 ft.
